Methods in ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection that return SUSHI.Regression
private  SUSHI.Regression SUSHI.getBestFitRegression(SUSHI.Regression[] regressions)
          Finds a regression with the highest r^2 coefficient among given regressions.
private  SUSHI.Regression[] SUSHI.getRegressions()
          Returns three different regression models, namely, linear, log, and exponential.
 

Methods in ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection that return types with arguments of type SUSHI.Regression
private
<T> Map<Resource,SUSHI.Regression>
SUSHI.getResource2Regression(List<ScoredEntity<T>> documents, List<Resource> resources)
          For each distinct resource in resources returns the best-fit regression between scores and ranks of documents in that resource.
 

Methods in ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection with parameters of type SUSHI.Regression

          Finds a regression with the highest r^2 coefficient among given regressions.
 

Method parameters in ch.usi.inf.lidr.selection with type arguments of type SUSHI.Regression

SUSHI.getCompleteDocumentRanking(Map<Resource,SUSHI.Regression> resource2regression, List<ScoredEntity<T>> documents, List<Resource> resources)
          Based on the given regressions estimates the scores of the top-L documents, where L = rankThreshold.
